articles.author: The New York Times
articles.title: Donald Trump’s Time-Tested Legal Strategy: Attack and Delay
articles.description: Across many court cases over the decades, Mr. Trump has regularly leaned on those tactics. Now facing criminal charges in Manhattan, he has already lashed out at the judge.
articles.content:
Attack. Attack. Attack.
Delay. Delay. Delay.
